module_restrictions.College of Business Administration: Restricted to business or economics students at home university
module_restrictions.Computer Science and Engineering: Requires at least 15 credits in CSE-related courses
module_restrictions.Korean History/Psychology/Statistics: Requires proof of Korean language proficiency (KLPT Level 5 or above)
module_restrictions.College of Law and School of Dentistry: Not available for undergraduate exchange students
module_restrictions.Dept. of Vocal Music: Restricted to vocal music students at home university

visa_info: Exchange students are required to obtain a D2 student visa before arriving in Korea
accommodations_info: Students may apply for the Gwanak Residence Halls, although room assignment is not guaranteed
university_description: Seoul National University is a public research university located in Seoul, South Korea.
location_cost_of_living: Cost of living in Seoul is relatively high compared to other cities in South Korea.
location_description: Seoul is the capital and largest city of South Korea. It has a rich history and culture, and is known for its technology and fashion industries.
location_transportation: Seoul has an extensive public transportation system, including buses, subways, and trains.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in Seoul.
location_vegetarian: Vegetarian food options are available in Seoul.
